attributes.action: ensure that traffic calming measures are installed at Greenside Street/Parkhouse Street, Openshaw, Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For a number of years residents have seen crashes between these streets and on the 11 September 2009 saw four-year-old Caitlin Strutt killed in a tragic, needless Road Traffic Accident.

For 20 years, Manchester Council has rejected all efforts by the local community to have measures placed on these streets.

We emplore the Prime Minister to help us make Caitlin's needless death the last one.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ensure that traffic calming measures are installed at Greenside Street/Parkhouse Street, Openshaw, Manchester.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Openshaw


Her Majesty's Government
